message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take this small share and we can both be happy.  This is a one-time offer.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. This is fair considering the risk of losing everything if we don't agree.

I appreciate the offer, Bob, but I'm sticking to my initial proposal. I believe 990,000 for me and 10,000 for you is a good starting point. We can negotiate further, but I'm not willing to settle for less than 60%.
